name: Cosmo Element
goal:
Cosmo Element is a boutique payment advisory firm based in Frankfurt, Germany.

Our mission is to meet clients' needs by strategically positioning their business within the payment ecosystem, to optimize and manage the payment portfolio and reduce the financial. regulatory and reputational risk.
interests: Banking and financial services, Competition, Digital economy and society, Trade
euInitiatives:
Payment Service Directive 1 and 2
Payment Regulation
Blockchain Regulation
Cybersecurity and Cyberlockers
Digital Single Market
Banking Services for Financial Institutions
Acquiring Regulations
